reviews.review:
So, This game is really good
The gameplay isn't really boring and you can play alone or with friends.
This game did such an amazing job implementing the idea of slasher movies but in game.
I advise you to buy it if you are a fan of competitive games.

The only thing that this game has that's bad is the toxic community that isn't noob friendly.
The players sometimes prefer to be toxic than to play the game normally and that can lead to the fall of the whole team.
If you are going to start playing, maybe it's best if you start with a friend that's neither toxic or real competitive because games are supposed to be fun.

Personally the game irritates me because of bugs, long queues for killers, toxic people(mostly survivors) and becase it loves to kick me out of the game when I'm in the middle of my game. I have to constantly fix game files(havent changed ANYTHING NEVER) that's why I lately don't play it that much and don't enjoy it that much. 
But beside that I would reccomend the game. If you won't have issues like this you will surely enjoy this game! It's fun and there's a lot to do and a lot to learn to improve your gameplay if you have enough patience. Not everyone is toxic and there are some kind and fun people that play this game that can make the game even better!
我也不知道该说啥，奥里给，买就完事了

Concept di gioco con molto potenziale, peccato che è mal sfruttato.
Parlo dei sopravvissuti, che sia al livello basso o alto, comunque partono sempre TROPPO svantaggiati, come ad esempio quando vengono feriti per la seconda volta e per recuperare hanno bisogno dell'aiuto di qualcuno; inoltre, non dimentichiamoci che quando tu saboti un gancio dopo un po' si ricrea...e francamente parlando i ganci sono troppi, troppo facile per il mostro. Se proprio volete fare che un sopravvissuto saboti un gancio provvisoriamente allora mettete meno ganci nella mappa.
Servono mappe più grandi e il killer quando parte non deve vedere la posizione dei generatori, al massimo solo quando si avvicina.
Alla fine invece, quando rimane l'ultimo sopravvissuto e si apre la botola, sarebbe bene se ne venisse segnalata la posizione o per lo meno la zona in cui si può trovare, per aiutare un po' il sopravvissuto.
Forse mi sarà sfuggito qualcosa, nel caso aggiorno la recensione.
Del resto, è un bel gioco, sarebbe stato più interessante se ci fosse stata una grafica migliore perché questa è ormai obsoleta e sono totalmente contrario alla scelta di comprare per forza un DLC se si vuole giocare un mostro o un sopravvissuto.

キラーがやりたくてこのゲームを買ったのですが全くマッチングしないので仕方なくサバイバーやってます。
サバイバーもそれなりに面白いのですが、やっぱり殺られるよりも殺りたいですよね。
新規参加勢にもキラーマッチングさせてください。
※追記
土日とか人の多い時間帯は5分程度待てばマッチングするようになりました。
※再追記
レビューを書いたときから更に10時間ほどプレイしてみましたが、段々とコツが掴めてきて4釣りとかもできるようになってきました。時間帯にもよりますがパーティーと遭遇するときが1番やる気が出ますね。4釣りしてやった時にはアドレナリンが出て思わず叫びたくなりますね笑
ハマればハマるほど面白いゲームだなと思います。
Hermoso este juego, nada como ser la mente asesina maestra.

Como TODO juego ( y mas si es cooperativo) está lleno de gente tóxica, peeeeeeero... a mi me ENCANTA♥
Si es verdad que tiene muchos bugs y algunos temitas que solucionar, pero se disfruta de igual forma. Es un juego para distenderse y jugar tranqui, a tu forma sin importar lo que digan los demás. Con amigos mucho mejor!!

Un buen juego, divertido pero donde tenes que ponerle muchas horas para desbloquear habilidades de cada personaje (Incluidas las "Enseñables", que desbloquean para otros personajes), lamentablemente la comunidad (En su gran mayoria los que juegan de sobreviviente) y los desarrolladores (Haciendo cada vez mas dificil jugar como Asesino, en un juego donde se supone que el asesino es "el que tiene el poder") arruina la experiencia para los nuevos (Y no tan nuevos) jugadores.
bug非常多，人类修机非常快，屠夫守尸大针对，垃圾游戏真垃圾

A great game, there's a lot of work for the devs to do but they really did a pretty good job so far :)

Curto demais o jogo e ainda jogo bastante, porém não vou recomendar. Os desenvolvedores não ligam para o que a comunidade fala, eles simplesmente ignoram. Agora mesmo, o servidor DELES caiu e eu tomei ban. Sem contar diversas outras coisas, como demorar 15 a 30 minutos pra jogar de killer antes das 19 horas, atualizações que enfraquecem killers já fracos, enfim. Eu jogo e continuarei jogando, porém, pelo descaso dos desenvolvedores não recomendarei.

Dead By Daylight in a Nutshell
This game is good if your either lonely and could never get friends so you fuel those sorrows with blood thirsty rage killing innocents trying to escape with their lives orrrrr if you have pals that you can team up with and T-bag that same sad lonely killer and say "gg ez get nae naed" at the end of each game. It has a great arrange of characters featuring "Dwight the Hottie", "Blendett", "Gotta go fast", and many many more on the Survivor side. On the Killers side you have a lot of classics from those movies that give you the good ol' nightmares and then that one killer that I personally despise who just goes zap zap and shoves a tazer up where the sun don't shine. There's a great amount of maps that make you say you hate but that's just cuz your bad at the game and just need a lil practice. Then when you get better you'll still probably not like a lot of them and wont have a favorite and probably never use the map offerings because its better just to use any other offering cuz all maps are still decent. And If you ever see a survivor Bloody Clothes just know your in for a random treat. If you ever see a Killer with Bloody Clothes or like any skin I have found its just best to sacrifice yourself or go extreme tryhard. Custom is fun if you want to make your friends to hate you or to second guess if your even good enough to be in their DBD Moon Walking Clan. All in all this game is fun and you can get great moments out of it as long as you don't have doctor trying to give you some good ol' "Family therapy" 

Now that im done with this mind blowing review I feel like someone should get me the Stranger things dlc especially since there are deals on dlcs. I just want Steve's beautiful head of hair as one of my playable options please and thank you.

หากกำลังหาเกมที่ตอบสนอง Need ในความต้องการกรี๊ด บวกกับปั่นหัวเพื่อน เกมนี้ค่อนข้างจะเป็นตัวเลือกที่ดี ได้ทั้งเล่นเพื่อความสนุกและจริงจัง และด้วยอัพเดทใหม่ฉลองครบรอบ 4 ปี ทำให้ภาพของเกมดูสวยขึ้น น่าเล่นขึ้น โดยรวมคือดือ
